name: Moonkeeper
description:
MoonKeeper Keep the Balance You are a Luna, a Moonkeeper in training. You are part of a vast group of planetary custodians that have dedicated their lives to protect the sacred laws of the universe. Once you’ve completed your rite of passage, you will become the next Moonkeeper, a life-long duty that will place the balance of the cosmos in your hands. As a Moonkeeper, you are tasked with ensuring the correct rotation of the moon. To do so, you will need to collect enough light orbs to ensure that the Moon’s light level correlates with the Sacred Lunar Calendar. Fail, and your failure will have a rippling effect that could unravel the fabric of existence. That’s once you’ve completed your training and earned your right to become the next protector of the Moon.
